 2020-03302020-05-13,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (COVID-19 â€” Deemed Remittance)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (COVID-19 - DEEMED REMITTANCE) in order to (1) provide support to more employers through the Canada Emergency Wage Subsidy; and (2) give legal effect, for the temporary 10 per cent wage subsidy, to the amounts that an employer may receive in respect of that subsidy.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0106 Publication Date: 2020-05-27
